Our Process

We specialize in listening to our customers explain the problems they are experiencing in order to offer the best possible solution and execute on the plan we agree will achieve the desired outcome.

Listen

We do a great deal of listening to let you fully explain the nuances of the problem you need to solve.

Understand

We ask a litany of questions in order to help us put ourselves in your shoes so that our perspective lines up with your experiences.

Translate

We take our new understanding of your problem and translate it into the actionable steps necessary to solve your problem.

Execute

We execute the project plan while keeping an open line of communication to ensure everyone is on the same page.

Portfolio

Wistia

This is a work in progress that will integrate wistia.com with Shopify. Video marketing is booming and Wistia is not only a great company with fantastic support but their heatmap analytics are amazing!

KISSmetrics

While Google Analytics tells you what is going on on your site, KISSmetrics tells you who is doing what on your site. With this Shopify integration, you get fully integrated with KISSmetrics by simply adding your API Key!
Find out more.

CrazyEgg

Knowing where visitors to a webpage are looking and interacting provides a great deal of information about why a certain page is converting visitors into customers or not. CrazyEgg builds heatmaps that show where visitors are interacting.
Find out more.

Facadify

One of the most critical and difficult things for a website or shop owner to do is A/B Test for higher conversion rates. This Shopify integration enables the use of Google Content Experiments on a Shopify store.
Find out more.

Lemme Engineering

This custom Content Management System allows the customer to maintain the content of their site with a simple web interface.
Find out more.
